original_title: Pizza Hut’s hopes a new $5 pizza turns its fortunes around | CNN Business
article_summary: Pizza Hut introduces a new $5 pizza, "Crafted Flatzz," to boost sales and improve value perception, as the chain has experienced seven consecutive quarters of declines due to customer confusion over deals and competition from rivals like Domino's and Papa John's offering better deals and new menu items.</s>
